name: Zeichnet 7. Kriegsanleihe! LCCN2004666154 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Zeichnet 7. Kriegsanleihe! Abstract: Poster shows a girl in traditional Czech(?) costume in a field of flowers; near her is the dove of peace. Text: Subscribe to the 7th War Loan! Zivnostenska Banka branch office, Vienna. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 94 x 63 cm. Notes: Minka Podhajská.; Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Title from item.
